verses.verse: ( To the Church in Ephesus) ( ( 510 19:8-12 ; 560 1:1-2 )) Τῷ <WG3588> Tō [“] To the ἀγγέλῳ <WG32> angelō angel τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἐν <WG1722> en in Ἐφέσῳ <WG2181> Ephesō Ephesus ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church γράψον <WG1125> grapson write : Τάδε <WG3592> Tade These [are] λέγει <WG3004> legei the words ὁ <WG3588> ho of Him who κρατῶν <WG2902> kratōn holds τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἀστέρας <WG792> asteras stars ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - δεξιᾷ <WG1188> dexia right hand αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ὁ <WG3588> ho - περιπατῶν <WG4043> peripatōn [and] walks ἐν <WG1722> en vvv μέσῳ <WG3319> mesō among τῶν <WG3588> tōn the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven λυχνιῶν <WG3087> lychniōn lampstands . τῶν <WG3588> tōn - χρυσῶν <WG5552> chrysōn golden

Οἶδα <WG1492> Oida I know τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds , σου <WG4771> sou your καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὸν <WG3588> ton - κόπον <WG2873> kopon labor , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] ὑπομονήν <WG5281> hypomonēn perseverance . σου <WG4771> sou your καὶ <WG2532> kai [I know] ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνῃ <WG1410> dynē you cannot βαστάσαι <WG941> bastasai tolerate κακούς <WG2556> kakous [those who are] evil , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπείρασας <WG3985> epeirasas you have tested τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who λέγοντας <WG3004> legontas claim ἑαυτοὺς <WG1438> heautous to be ἀποστόλους <WG652> apostolous apostles . καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv οὐκ <WG3756> ouk falsely εἰσίν <WG1510> eisin vvv καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὗρες <WG2147> heures exposed αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous - ψευδεῖς <WG5571> pseudeis as liars

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὑπομονὴν <WG5281> hypomonēn persevered ἔχεις <WG2192> echeis you have καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐβάστασας <WG941> ebastasas endured many things διὰ <WG1223> dia for the sake of τὸ <WG3588> to - ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name . μου <WG1473> mou My καὶ <WG2532> kai Without οὐ <WG3756> ou . . . κεκοπίακες <WG2872> kekopiakes growing weary ,

Ἀλλὰ <WG235> Alla But ἔχω <WG2192> echō I have κατὰ <WG2596> kata against σοῦ <WG4771> sou you : ὅτι <WG3754> hoti this τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀγάπην <WG26> agapēn love . σου <WG4771> sou your τὴν <WG3588> tēn - πρώτην <WG4413> prōtēn first ἀφῆκες <WG863> aphēkes You have abandoned

μνημόνευε <WG3421> mnēmoneue keep in mind οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore , πόθεν <WG4159> pothen how far πέπτωκας* <WG4098> peptōkas you have fallen . καὶ <WG2532> kai - μετανόησον <WG3340> metanoēson Repent καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta the πρῶτα <WG4413> prōta at first . ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds [you did] ποίησον <WG4160> poiēson perform εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de But μή <WG3361> mē vvv ἔρχομαί <WG2064> erchomai I will come σοι <WG4771> soi to you καὶ <WG2532> kai and κινήσω <WG2795> kinēsō remove τὴν <WG3588> tēn - λυχνίαν <WG3087> lychnian lampstand σου <WG4771> sou your ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - τόπου <WG5117> topou place . αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs its ἐὰν <WG1437> ean vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv μετανοήσῃς <WG3340> metanoēsēs you do not repent ,

Ἀλλὰ <WG235> Alla But τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this ἔχεις <WG2192> echeis you have ὅτι <WG3754> hoti [to your credit] : μισεῖς <WG3404> miseis You hate τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἔργα <WG2041> erga works τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the Νικολαϊτῶν <WG3531> Nikolaitōn Nicolaitans , ἃ <WG3739> ha which κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō I also μισῶ <WG3404> misō hate .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho He who ἔχων <WG2192> echōn has οὖς <WG3775> ous an ear , ἀκουσάτω <WG191> akousatō let him hear τί <WG5101> ti what τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit λέγει <WG3004> legei says ταῖς <WG3588> tais to the ἐκκλησίαις <WG1577> ekklēsiais churches . Τῷ <WG3588> Tō To the [one who] νικῶντι <WG3528> nikōnti overcomes , δώσω <WG1325> dōsō I will grant [the right] αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . φαγεῖν <WG5315> phagein to eat ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the ξύλου <WG3586> xylou tree τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs of life ὅ <WG3739> ho - ἐστιν <WG1510> estin - ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the Παραδείσῳ <WG3857> Paradeisō Paradise τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

( To the Church in Smyrna) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῷ <WG3588> tō To the ἀγγέλῳ <WG32> angelō angel τῆς <WG3588> tēs of ἐν <WG1722> en in Σμύρνῃ <WG4667> Smyrnē Smyrna ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias the church γράψον <WG1125> grapson write : Τάδε <WG3592> Tade These [are] λέγει <WG3004> legei the words ὁ <WG3588> ho of the πρῶτος <WG4413> prōtos First καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho the ἔσχατος <WG2078> eschatos Last , ὃς <WG3739> hos who ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto died νεκρὸς <WG3498> nekros . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔζησεν <WG2198> ezēsen returned to life .

Οἶδά <WG1492> Oida I know σου <WG4771> sou your τὴν <WG3588> tēn - θλῖψιν <WG2347> thlipsin affliction καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] πτωχείαν <WG4432> ptōcheian poverty — ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla though πλούσιος <WG4145> plousios rich ! εἶ <WG1510> ei you are καὶ <WG2532> kai And [I am aware of] τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βλασφημίαν <WG988> blasphēmian slander ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῶν <WG3588> tōn those who λεγόντων <WG3004> legontōn claim Ἰουδαίους <WG2453> Ioudaious Jews , εἶναι <WG1510> einai to be ἑαυτούς <WG1438> heautous - καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk falsely εἰσίν <WG1510> eisin - ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but [are in fact] συναγωγὴ <WG4864> synagōgē a synagogue τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Σατανᾶ <WG4567> Satana of Satan .

Μηδὲν* <WG3367> Mēden Do not φοβοῦ <WG5399> phobou fear ἃ <WG3739> ha what μέλλεις <WG3195> melleis you are about πάσχειν <WG3958> paschein to suffer . ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou Look , μέλλει <WG3195> mellei is about βάλλειν <WG906> ballein to throw ὁ <WG3588> ho the διάβολος <WG1228> diabolos devil ἐξ <WG1537> ex [some] of ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you εἰς <WG1519> eis into φυλακὴν <WG5438> phylakēn prison ἵνα <WG2443> hina to πειρασθῆτε <WG3985> peirasthēte test you , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἕξετε <WG2192> hexete you will suffer θλῖψιν <WG2347> thlipsin tribulation ἡμερῶν <WG2250> hēmerōn days . δέκα <WG1176> deka [for] ten γίνου <WG1096> ginou Be πιστὸς <WG4103> pistos faithful ἄχρι <WG891> achri [even] unto θανάτου <WG2288> thanatou death , καὶ <WG2532> kai and δώσω <WG1325> dōsō I will give σοι <WG4771> soi you τὸν <WG3588> ton the στέφανον <WG4735> stephanon crown τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs of life .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho He who ἔχων <WG2192> echōn has οὖς <WG3775> ous an ear , ἀκουσάτω <WG191> akousatō let him hear τί <WG5101> ti what τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit λέγει <WG3004> legei says ταῖς <WG3588> tais to the ἐκκλησίαις <WG1577> ekklēsiais churches . Ὁ <WG3588> HO The [one who] νικῶν <WG3528> nikōn overcomes οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἀδικηθῇ <WG91> adikēthē will not be harmed ἐκ <WG1537> ek by τοῦ <WG3588> tou the θανάτου <WG2288> thanatou death . τοῦ <WG3588> tou - δευτέρου <WG1208> deuterou second

( To the Church in Pergamum) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῷ <WG3588> tō To the ἀγγέλῳ <WG32> angelō angel τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἐν <WG1722> en in Περγάμῳ <WG4010> Pergamō Pergamum ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church γράψον <WG1125> grapson write : Τάδε <WG3592> Tade These [are] λέγει <WG3004> legei the words ὁ <WG3588> ho of the [One who] ἔχων <WG2192> echōn holds τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ῥομφαίαν <WG4501> rhomphaian sword . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - δίστομον <WG1366> distomon double-edged τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ὀξεῖαν <WG3691> oxeian sharp ,

Οἶδα <WG1492> Oida I know ποῦ <WG4226> pou where κατοικεῖς <WG2730> katoikeis you live , ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where ὁ <WG3588> ho the θρόνος <WG2362> thronos throne τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Σατανᾶ <WG4567> Satana of Satan [sits] . καὶ <WG2532> kai Yet κρατεῖς <WG2902> krateis you have held fast τὸ <WG3588> to - ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name μου <WG1473> mou to My καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἠρνήσω <WG720> ērnēsō have not denied τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] πίστιν <WG4102> pistin faith μου <WG1473> mou in Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai even ἐν <WG1722> en in ταῖς <WG3588> tais the ἡμέραις <WG2250> hēmerais day Ἀντιπᾶς <WG493> Antipas Antipas ὁ <WG3588> ho - μάρτυς <WG3144> martys witness μου <WG1473> mou [when] My ὁ <WG3588> ho - πιστός <WG4103> pistos faithful μου <WG1473> mou - ὃς <WG3739> hos - ἀπεκτάνθη <WG615> apektanthē was killed παρ’ <WG3844> par’ among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὅπου <WG3699> hopou where ὁ <WG3588> ho - Σατανᾶς <WG4567> Satanas Satan κατοικεῖ <WG2730> katoikei dwells .

Ἀλλ’ <WG235> All’ But ἔχω <WG2192> echō I have κατὰ <WG2596> kata against σοῦ <WG4771> sou you , ὀλίγα <WG3641> oliga a few things ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἔχεις <WG2192> echeis of you ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei [some] κρατοῦντας <WG2902> kratountas hold τὴν <WG3588> tēn to the διδαχὴν <WG1322> didachēn teaching Βαλαάμ <WG903> Balaam of Balaam , ὃς <WG3739> hos who ἐδίδασκεν <WG1321> edidasken taught τῷ <WG3588> tō - Βαλὰκ <WG904> Balak Balak βαλεῖν <WG906> balein to place σκάνδαλον <WG4625> skandalon a stumbling block ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion before τῶν <WG3588> tōn the υἱῶν <WG5207> huiōn vvv Ἰσραήλ <WG2474> Israēl Israelites φαγεῖν <WG5315> phagein so they would eat εἰδωλόθυτα <WG1494> eidōlothyta food sacrificed to idols καὶ <WG2532> kai and πορνεῦσαι <WG4203> porneusai commit sexual immorality .

οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs vvv ἔχεις <WG2192> echeis - καὶ <WG2532> kai also σὺ <WG4771> sy [some of] you κρατοῦντας <WG2902> kratountas hold τὴν <WG3588> tēn to the διδαχὴν <WG1322> didachēn teaching τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the Νικολαϊτῶν <WG3531> Nikolaitōn Nicolaitans . ὁμοίως <WG3668> homoiōs In the same way ,

μετανόησον <WG3340> metanoēson repent ! οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore εἰ <WG1487> ei . . . δὲ <WG1161> de Otherwise μή <WG3361> mē . . . ἔρχομαί <WG2064> erchomai I will come σοι <WG4771> soi to you ταχύ <WG5035> tachy shortly καὶ <WG2532> kai and πολεμήσω <WG4170> polemēsō wage war μετ’ <WG3326> met’ against αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them ἐν <WG1722> en with τῇ <WG3588> tē the ῥομφαίᾳ <WG4501> rhomphaia sword τοῦ <WG3588> tou - στόματός <WG4750> stomatos mouth . μου <WG1473> mou of My

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho He who ἔχων <WG2192> echōn has οὖς <WG3775> ous an ear , ἀκουσάτω <WG191> akousatō let him hear τί <WG5101> ti what τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit λέγει <WG3004> legei says ταῖς <WG3588> tais to the ἐκκλησίαις <WG1577> ekklēsiais churches . Τῷ <WG3588> Tō who νικῶντι <WG3528> nikōnti overcomes , δώσω <WG1325> dōsō I will give αὐτῷ <WG846> autō To [the one] τοῦ <WG3588> tou - μάννα <WG3131> manna manna . τοῦ <WG3588> tou the κεκρυμμένου <WG2928> kekrymmenou hidden καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv δώσω <WG1325> dōsō I will also give αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him ψῆφον <WG5586> psēphon stone λευκήν <WG3022> leukēn a white καὶ <WG2532> kai [with] ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn . . . ψῆφον <WG5586> psēphon . . . ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name , καινὸν <WG2537> kainon a new γεγραμμένον <WG1125> gegrammenon inscribed ὃ <WG3739> ho - οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis - οἶδεν <WG1492> oiden known εἰ <WG1487> ei only μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho to the [one who] λαμβάνων <WG2983> lambanōn receives [it] .

( To the Church in Thyatira) ( ( 510 16:11-15 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῷ <WG3588> tō To ἀγγέλῳ <WG32> angelō [the] angel τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἐν <WG1722> en in Θυατείροις <WG2363> Thyateirois Thyatira ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church γράψον <WG1125> grapson write : Τάδε <WG3592> Tade These [are] λέγει <WG3004> legei the words ὁ <WG3588> ho of the Υἱὸς <WG5207> Huios Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἔχων <WG2192> echōn whose τοὺς <WG3588> tous - ὀφθαλμοὺς <WG3788> ophthalmous eyes [are] αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou . . . ὡς <WG5613> hōs like φλόγα <WG5395> phloga a blazing πυρός <WG4442> pyros fire καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - πόδες <WG4228> podes feet αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [whose] ὅμοιοι <WG3664> homoioi [are] like χαλκολιβάνῳ <WG5474> chalkolibanō polished bronze .

Οἶδά <WG1492> Oida I know σου <WG4771> sou your τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds — καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀγάπην <WG26> agapēn love , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] πίστιν <WG4102> pistin faith , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] διακονίαν <WG1248> diakonian service , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn [your] ὑπομονήν <WG5281> hypomonēn perseverance — σου <WG4771> sou your καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga deeds σου <WG4771> sou your τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔσχατα <WG2078> eschata latter πλείονα <WG4119> pleiona [are] greater τῶν <WG3588> tōn than [your] πρώτων <WG4413> prōtōn first .

Ἀλλὰ <WG235> Alla But ἔχω <WG2192> echō I have [this] κατὰ <WG2596> kata against σοῦ <WG4771> sou you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - : ἀφεῖς <WG863> apheis You tolerate τὴν <WG3588> tēn that γυναῖκα <WG1135> gynaika woman Ἰεζάβελ <WG2403> Iezabel Jezebel , ἡ <WG3588> hē who λέγουσα <WG3004> legousa calls ἑαυτὴν <WG1438> heautēn herself προφῆτιν <WG4398> prophētin a prophetess . καὶ <WG2532> kai - διδάσκει <WG1321> didaskei By her teaching καὶ <WG2532> kai - πλανᾷ <WG4105> plana she misleads τοὺς <WG3588> tous - ἐμοὺς <WG1699> emous My δούλους <WG1401> doulous servants πορνεῦσαι <WG4203> porneusai to be sexually immoral καὶ <WG2532> kai and φαγεῖν <WG5315> phagein to eat εἰδωλόθυτα <WG1494> eidōlothyta food sacrificed to idols .

καὶ <WG2532> kai Even [though] ἔδωκα <WG1325> edōka I have given αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her χρόνον <WG5550> chronon time ἵνα <WG2443> hina to μετανοήσῃ <WG3340> metanoēsē repent καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θέλει <WG2309> thelei she is unwilling μετανοῆσαι <WG3340> metanoēsai - . ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῆς <WG3588> tēs - πορνείας <WG4202> porneias immorality , αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs her
